mapper.select: select c.*, p.pname, p.options, p.category1, p.category2, p.category3 from (select c.*, pb.title from cart c left outer join proboard pb on c.pbno = pb.pbno where customer = #{customer} ) c left outer join production p on c.pno = p.pno order by cartdate desc
mapper.delete: delete from cart where pno = #{pno} and customer = #{customer}
mapper.update: update cart set pno = #{pno}, price = #{price}, count = #{count}, cartdate = sysdate where customer=#{customer} and pno = #{lastpno}
